file_content.text: What I say? More Imperials. Imperials too dumb to be scared.
Hand over the Fatality records or you'll freeze with them.
Give me what I want.
I get the pleasure of killing the dumbest lout in the galaxy.
This is too easy. [Attack]
Blaster, mine. Your head, mine.
I'll say this slow. [Attack]
All this over frozen droids?
Droids?
Hunter-Killer droids. HKs. I kill Imperials for them; they kill Imperials for me.
Maybe I send your body back to camp. Scare other Imperials away.
Weak Imperials die fast, freeze slow. You, I think opposite.
Ha! Count bodies. I kill your kind before, here and all over this planet.
World Dread Masters'. Ship Dread Masters'. Droids Dread Masters'. You... dead.
Exterminating you will do the Dread Masters--and your species--a favor.
They won't miss you. [Attack]
Look around. Lots of dead Imperials, frozen stiff. Never leaving. Scared now?
You have no idea who you're dealing with. I send fools like you to the Void every morning.
No, but you should be.
I prefer to kill enemies who know what they're getting into. You're an idiot. Reconsider while you can.
Seems unfair to kill a fool.
I didn't come here to talk. I came to cleanse the galactic gene pool.
Shut up and die. [Attack]
